cells.data: -- mappend (<>) :: Monoid a => a -> a -> aon mappend(a, b)	if class of a is record and class of b is record then		script instanceMay			on |λ|(strType)				set mb to lookup(strType, ¬					{Maybe:mappendMaybe, Ordering:mappendOrdering, Tuple:mappendTuple})			end |λ|		end script		set mbi to bindMay(lookup("type", a), instanceMay)		if Nothing of mbi then			a & b		else			mReturn(Just of mbi)'s |λ|(a, b)		end if	else		a & b	end ifend mappend
